page.title: 08LODERS PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Loders School is a small primary school in nice village. The school owns a playground and its neighbours lend us a field in which we hold our May Fair and Sports Day. The field contains a games shed, two storage sheds, a sandpit and a climbing frame. Hopefully it will hold more soon. The school itself has three classrooms one for infants, one for 1st and 2nd years and one for the 3rd and 4th years. It also has a cloakroom and an office. The staff is made up of three teachers, one part-time teacher, one welfare assistant and a secretary. All of them are very nice. The school's average population is around 70.For transport a mini bus is supplied for children who are not in walking distance and have no other means of transport.
